txt.en: You have destroyed many barrels of Orkish armour, spears, and swords at Bagûd-mekhem.

Barrels of Orkish armour, spears, and swords can be found at Bagûd-mekhem.\n\nYou have discovered a stockpile of barrels filled with Orkish weapons and armour at Bagûd-mekhem. You should destroy barrels of Orkish armour, spears, and swords at Bagûd-mekhem.
Seemingly well-prepared to endure a long siege during the War of Three Peaks, the Orcs of Gundabad have amassed a stockpile of weapons and armour within Bagûd-mekhem.

DNT Defeat the forces of Gundabad at Azgh-buzru ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
DNT Defeat the forces of Gundabad at Azgh-buzru ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Within Bagûd-mekhem, the Orcs of Gundabad have amassed a stockpile of weapons and armour — and the means to endure a long siege during the War of Three Peaks.\n\nIf the War of Three Peaks is to be won, the Orkish weapons and armour at Bagûd-mekhem must be destroyed.
You have destroyed many barrels of Orkish armour, spears, and swords at Bagûd-mekhem and put an end to the Orcs' plans to withstand a long siege by the Gabil'akkâ.
